column6: Gravity's dark obsession mounts, Firestar's life threatens to implode, Toro's frustrations grow, and Nomad and Araña make a shocking discovery about the origins of the Bastards of Evil, whose plans to follow up on their vicious debut get underway. Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:David Baldeon | penciller:David Lafuente | writer:Sean McKeever
